title: LifeVantage outlines FY 2025 revenue growth of 16% driven by MindBody system expansion
excerpt: LifeVantage Q3 2025 shows 21% revenue growth, driven by MindBody system success.
text: Earnings Call Insights: LifeVantage Corporation (LFVN) Q3 2025 Management View CEO Steve Fife reported $58.4 million in Q3 revenue, a 21% year-over-year increase, primarily driven by the MindBody GLP-1 system. Earnings Call Insights: LifeVantage Corporation (LFVN) Q3 2025

Management View

  • CEO Steve Fife reported $58.4 million in Q3 revenue, a 21% year-over-year increase, primarily driven by the MindBody GLP-1 system. U.S. revenues grew 31%, while international markets saw a 7% decline. The international launch of MindBody is expected to
